title: Round Slab Serif with Contrasting Italics
content:
I'm looking for a slab serif with open shapes and contrasting italics. I really love Salvo Serif, with its round O and in general very open round counters: [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/salvoserif/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714124617/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/salvoserif/ "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/salvoserif/")

However, its italics are really just oblique:

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714124617im_/http:/i.imgur.com/l0jaoIB.png)

Does anyone know of a similar font with true italics?
author: noktulo

comments.content:
A very good slab with an incredible Italic: [http://ernestinefont.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714124617/http:/ernestinefont.com/ "http://ernestinefont.com/")  
Disclaimer: I had a hand in it.

hhp
It may not be rounded enough for you, but PMN Caecilia has a gorgeous italic.
